评论详情: I love these. These are so cute, comfy, and lightweight. I got a lot of compliments on them on the golf course.

THESE ARE SOOOO COMFORTABLE & CUTE!!!! I literally just tried them on and I am THRILLED!!! they are so comfortable and light!!! I was wearing black underwear and you can't even see through it, which is fantastic for anything white.. I ordered XL according to the chart...amazon said I should order a Large...well the Large definitely would have fit well too...but I actually prefer shorts this short to be on the looser side, so the XL hit the spot. If you want them on the tighter side, I would listen to Amazon or size down from the chart. For reference: 5'2" 170lbs & 44" hips

评论概述: cute but the fit could be better
评论详情: Tbh, i love the bubblegum pink color, and they are so soft. I just wish that the waistband wasn't so large, it kid of squares you off, even if you have a smaller waist than hips. I am short waisted, so just a personal preference. Regardless, these are really comfortable and a good length.
Soft fabric- look better in person. Flattering
I have these in two colors, black and white. They are so comfortable and soft. Love the elastic waistband and that I can wear a belt if I want to. The fit is perfect and True to size.
Immediately upon putting them on felt, the comfort and the material looks like it's going to last.
These shorts are cute and well made but are super huge on my skinny thighs. The waist fits fine but the legs are super huge and baggy. Not a good look if you are petite!

Why is this currently 3.7 stars😭 I am extremely picky when it comes to my golf outfit and this is everything I was looking for. Short, but not too short, flattering to my frame, comfy, soft, doesn’t look like running shorts, and all for an affordable price! Im blessed to have found these shorts because I wasn’t happy with my golf outfits before this as someone who doesn’t want to wear pants or skirts!
Great material have stretched to them. Comfort was really good although they seemed a little big would buy again.
Runs big
My daughter need a new pair of red golf shorts. Finding red it very difficult. Saw these and thougt we would try them. She loves that they are stretchy.

评论概述: These are the most comfortable shorts
评论详情: These shorts are so GREAT that I bought 3 colors so far!  Very comfortable and the shorts don’t rise.  You won’t regret.
These are way more comfortable than expected! They have a soft, lightweight feel, and fit true to size. I'm definitely ordering more in different colors!!
The shorts are very soft and comfortable. You can dress them up fairly easily. They are very lightweight, but not see-through.
Love the way they fit. you can dress them up or just with a t shirt

评论用户: Definitely the cheaper version not at all like the picture!! I order this pair and the more expensive pair and you can definitely tell the difference!! Not even worth 10$ you can get better pants at dollar store .
评论概述: Not at all like the picture
评论详情: These shorts are nothing like the picture!! Size down for sure !! I ended up sending mine back ! There definitely more athletic shorts then anything !
The material is not breathable. The shorts look more like swimwear. The leg area is too wide.
Fit great and very comfortable!! Highly recommend!
I didn't get these for golf but I really like them. They have a style where you can wear them outside the gym or just lounging. Just wish the material was different.

I love these so much that I ordered another pair and will probably order more! I probably could’ve worn a medium, but I ordered large. I like the way the large fits a little loose and comfortable! If you want a little snugger fit, order true size! I’m 5’6” and 165lbs, for reference! The quality is great! They don’t have to be tennis or golf shorts., very versatile, as I don’t play either lol. They do have some elasticity if you want to go a size down from what I ordered (like your true size). I still feel like they would look great!
These for nicely. The have pleates on the front. They are very flattering. They feel soft and are comfortable.

I do not play golf but I do spend a lot of time outdoors - yardwork, hikes, lake days. These are ideal for wearing outside even in the heat. Thankfully they are nice and loose (not tight around your legs) and the material is breathable and soft. These shorts are very true to size and are also a bit stretchy. They look super nice as well so they don't look exactly like exercise clothing, but you could very easily dress them up and wear them out.

These Blaosn Shorts are so stinking cute and unexpected! Not only is the style amazing, but the fact that these feel like gym short but look like a dressier pait is amazing. The fit is perfect, the material is soft, silky and like air and they look fabulous. I was excited for these but not trying to get too excited. As soon as I felt them and tried them on, I got over excited and gave everyone in my house an impromptu fashion show. Lol. Seriously, these are unbelievably awesome. My husband didn't believe they felt like gym shorts until I had him hold them after the catwalk show. He was amazed as well and said "why don't they ever make stuff like this for guys?". 🤔. I'm pretty sure they do and thr making part is that they did it for women as well. Loves it!

评论概述: Not my favorite shape - but is a super well constructed short.
评论详情: I don't know if its my particular body type (I have no hips, butt or thighs and am shaped like a adolescent boy - and I'm a 45 year old woman) but the fit was a little bunchy in the seems for me that I didn't particularly like - like intended bunching - very subtle however. I loved the high was it and the oversized band. The fabric was high quality and the pockets were a nice addition to a running short that I'm not necessarily used to.

评论概述: Beautiful, great quality shorts for summer
评论详情: I needed some more pairs of shorts for summer, and these are absolutely perfect. They are unbelievably comfortable with a good amount of stretch, the color is stunning and vivid, and they feel lightweight and very well-made. Truly an amazing value! I ordered my usual size and they are slightly loose, but they still fit fine. Just something to keep in mind. Overall, I definitely recommend these shorts. They are great for athletics, or casual wear!
Really nice shorts. Fit perfect. Material is light and keeps you cool. Very comfortable to wear.

These shorts are made of your standard athletic material. The seams, pockets and belt loops give them a more pulled together appearance than your standard athletic shorts. Great for golf or other outdoor activities when you want to wear something a little nicer than running shorts.

I'm kind of shocked how much I like these shorts!  I almost didn't order them thinking it would be way too obvious that they're athletic material but once they're on, they're very cute and comfortable.  I do think they run a bit large and would prefer a slightly more fitted look.  I ordered a small, which is my usual size in shorts and am tempted to order the extra small to see if that's a better fit for me.  I would recommend sizing down.

Soft fabric which looks dressier than most running shorts this item was a pleasant surprise. The fabric is flexible enough for a good workout without being loose or flimsy. The one downside is they are pretty short and much shorter than I would wear out in public to work out without something underneath of them. I took off a star because they are meant for running/biking/golf and as short as they are I feel like that should be made very clear in the ad so buyers are making a conscious choice about the length not getting a surprise.

The material is like athletic clothing. It is surprising that when you see them, you could not recognize the material, it looks like casual. The shape of these shorts are a little wider/looser at the bottom. I wish I ordered xs size... Normally, I am size small. These sorts are big for me.

I love these shorts! They are super comfortable and great for wearing around the house or when I'm outside running around with my kids. They could also be dressed up and would look rally nice with a cute top and a nice pair of sandals. The fit is great, they are super breathable for summer. They wash well and I put them in the dryer and they come out perfect with no wrinkles at all. Great quality, and excellent value for the money.
shorts are nice and stretchy. although says gym defly can be worn with outfits. didn’t quite understand the belt loops but overall very good
In love with these shorts! Very comfortable and light weight! They have a good stretch and I love that they are high waisted too!

These shorts fit as expected and advertised. They are definitely true to size for the waist band and are not tight in the leg/thigh area like some shorts are. They are very comfortable and flowy, not too tight in any spot. They have kept their size after washing and drying. They are perfect for my daughter to wear for softball and volleyball practices
Fits true to size. Comfortable and lightweight. Breathable.
I actually got these for work and I can't get over how comfortable these shorts are! They're flexible, breathable, and moisture wicking. They also sit at a great length for work or outside of work.
This cute and comfortable athletic shorts are good for any summer outing. The material is nice and lightweight, and fits true to size!
These shorts are a super soft material.  They are a good length & plus-sized  friendly. Size XL fits well with a little room. Great deep pockets are a nice touch. Definitely recommend. 10/10

As a woman who likes to cc , it's extremely difficult to find shorts  that are comfortable and that I can carry in.  These shorts are so comfortable and stretchy.  If you want a snug fit, size down one.  Because they have belt loops,  I can wear a belt and my cc. I love everything about these shorts and I'll be ordering more soon!

I know these say athletic shorts but these can easily be worn casually, or even for going out. They have belt loops and look great really nice on. I ordered a large (I’m 5’9” and around 150 lbs) because I like my shorts a little loose and because I’m tall and I don’t want them super short. They fit perfect so I’m glad I got a large. There’s some stretch as the material is 75% nylon and 25% elastane. They’re a comfortable too. I like them!

I’ve been looking for a pair of lightweight pink shorts to wear this summer, and these are perfect. I wanted them to fit a little oversized specially, since I am curvier on the bottom so I did size up to an XL Since they do have the belt loops, they fit perfectly. I like that they have pockets and these can be worn to work out or also just casually. 5’3”, 155 pounds, size 6 to 8

These are super cute. They have a dressy look to them and they are athletic material so they are very comfortable. They fit true to size, they are a little short but I got a medium so they would be more loose fit then tight fit. Definitely recommend!

I am very pleasantly surprised by these shorts. There was no size chart available so I ordered an XL, when normally I wear a Large. I like the fit. They are a bit loose, and have a lot of stretch to them. They are perfect for lounging. A Large would probably fit perfectly. It you like a looser fit, I'd suggest going up a size. The material is very soft and stretchy, and they don't bunch or ride up when you're walking. I would absolutely buy more of these.
Wife's words: I absolutely love these shorts! They are classy looking and extremely comfortable! Very good quality! I'm very impressed and would definitely recommend these shorts.

Very comfortable, the fabric is very soft, they fit me very well. I'm 140 pounds and I'm 5.4, a size S worked very well for me, very comfortable for walking on a day at the beach or park. They are of very good quality.

These are cute shorts that are a nice athletic fabric. Stretchy and breathable so can be used for working out, playing tennis or sports, or just casually going out. It’s a nice fit that isn’t too tight.
Not really a fan of these shorts. The style is not great, they don't look like the picture and they are not comfortable at all. Don't waste your money on these shorts!

评论概述: I was very surprised with these shorts.
评论详情: I'm 5' 8" tall, and 150 pounds, I ordered these in a medium. When I opened the package I instantly didn't like them. I thought the material was too cheap looking for what I wanted them for, I almost returned them without even trying them on. I'm so glad I didn't do that! When on the body the material looked way better than I thought it would. They surprisingly looked dressy. The sizing is good, I usually wear a small-medium, and the medium is usually looser on me but these hugged more than normal. I would still consider them true to size. I'm sure I will order these in other colors.
